1.title: The Setting

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Actors Marion Kerr and Ross Marquand join Director Brian Crewe to explain the film's setting as well their personal connections and reasons for wanting to make UNE LIBÉRATION.

2.title: Auditions

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Director Brian Crewe and Producer Hugh O'Brien discuss the difficulties in auditioning actors speaking a foreign language. Matthew Temple and Mark Jäger join the cast.

3.title: Stunt Rehearsals

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: During stunt rehearsals Marion Kerr faced off against Matthew Temple and Mark Jäger, with a little help from Stunt Coordinator / Producer Hugh O'Brien and Director Brian Crewe. Marion's biggest challenge, keeping a straight face.

4.title: Rehearsals

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Actors Ross Marquand and Marion Kerr are guided through an inventive rehearsal process by director Brian Crewe to prepare for their roles as estranged lovers in "Une Libération."

5.title: Production, Part 1

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Actors Ross Marquand and Marion Kerr describe the difficulties in turning modern day Los Angeles into World War II Paris. They highlight the work of DP George Feucht, Production Designer Amelia Brooke and Costume Designer Nancy Fisher.

6.title: Editing

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Director Brian Crewe and editor Jamie Cobb discuss their working process from pre-production to color correction. Topics include reviewing dailies, the pain of rough cuts, and the importance of the film's script supervisor.

7.title: Visual Effects

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: See how the Une Libération VFX team turned modern day California into WWII Paris with Visual Effects. Also, get a sneak peak at concept art for the Time Travel feature Building Time from director Brian Crewe and producer Hugh Aodh O'Brien.

8.title: Music

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Composer Darren Fung and director Brian Crewe sit down to discuss their creative collaboration for this World War II short film.

9.title: Sound

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Re-Recording mixer D.J. Lynch and director Brian James Crewe discuss dialog recording, ADR, Foley, Sound effect design and mixing. Plus learn the connection between Une Libération (2014) and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2012).

10.title: Production, Part 2

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Actor Marion Kerr and Producer Hugh O'Brien discuss the challenges of having guns on the set. Then actors Ross Marquand and Matthew Temple describe the process of bringing Kerr's script to life in collaboration with director Brian Crewe.

11.title: The Slap

episode of.title: The Making of Une Libération (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Actress Marion Kerr recalls the most violent, and amusing, thing to happen during production.

imdb.title: The Making of Une Libération
akas: The Making of Une Libération (United States)
plot: Director Brian Crewe partners with actors Ross Marquand (The Walking Dead) and Marion Kerr (Dark Skies) to shoot a short film set in WWII. They face many challenges including recreating war torn 1944 Paris in present day Los Angeles.::Film Crewe
